content.text: Match ends, Liverpool 4, Barcelona 0.
Second Half ends, Liverpool 4, Barcelona 0.
Goal!  Liverpool 4, Barcelona 0. Marko Grujic (Liverpool) header from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Lazar Markovic.
Dejan Lovren went off injured after Liverpool had used all subs.
Foul by Sergi Roberto (Barcelona).
Divock Origi (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona).
Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Munir El Haddadi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Sergi Samper.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Kevin Stewart.
Foul by Alberto Moreno (Liverpool).
Rafael Mújica (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jordan Henderson (Liverpool).
Foul by Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona).
Lazar Markovic (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Hand ball by Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona).
Substitution, Barcelona. Sergi Samper replaces Denis Suárez.
Substitution, Barcelona. Jesús Alfaro replaces Lionel Messi.
Substitution, Barcelona. Rafael Mújica replaces Luis Suárez.
Attempt missed. Munir El Haddadi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the left.
Attempt blocked. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Attempt blocked. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Sergi Roberto.
Substitution, Liverpool. Danny Ings replaces Roberto Firmino.
Substitution, Liverpool. Marko Grujic replaces Georginio Wijnaldum.
Substitution, Liverpool. Lazar Markovic replaces Sadio Mané.
Attempt missed. Sadio Mané (Liverpool) left footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Kevin Stewart.
Dejan Lovren (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Munir El Haddadi (Barcelona).
Attempt blocked. Munir El Haddadi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Andrés Iniesta.
Offside, Barcelona. Ivan Rakitic tries a through ball, but Lucas Digne is caught offside.
Substitution, Barcelona. Ivan Rakitic replaces Sergio Busquets.
Substitution, Barcelona. Andrés Iniesta replaces Arda Turan.
Substitution, Barcelona. Gerard Piqué replaces Javier Mascherano.
Substitution, Barcelona. Lucas Digne replaces Juan Cámara.
Dejan Lovren (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Foul by Lionel Messi (Barcelona).
Kevin Stewart (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sadio Mané (Liverpool).
Juan Cámara (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Kevin Stewart.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Kevin Stewart.
Attempt blocked. Munir El Haddadi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Javier Mascherano.
Goal!  Liverpool 3, Barcelona 0. Divock Origi (Liverpool) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Kevin Stewart.
Own Goal by Javier Mascherano, Barcelona.  Liverpool 2, Barcelona 0.
Substitution, Liverpool. Kevin Stewart replaces Emre Can.
Substitution, Barcelona. Sergi Roberto replaces Aleix Vidal.
Substitution, Barcelona. Claudio Bravo replaces Marc-André ter Stegen.
Substitution, Liverpool. Divock Origi replaces Philippe Coutinho.
Second Half begins Liverpool 1, Barcelona 0.
Substitution, Liverpool. Jordan Henderson replaces Adam Lallana.
First Half ends, Liverpool 1, Barcelona 0.
Arda Turan (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
